{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sitecom |model=WL-304 |revision=v1 (001) |asin=B003GQRR9W;DE;,B001BNN04I;IT; |newegg= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/25/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=AR7505SW22 |manuf_rev= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=K7SF5D8636V2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Infineon |cpu1_model=PSB 50600 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand=Ralink |cpu2_model=RT3052 |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |flags=ADSL2+ |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|Wireless ADSL2+ Modem Router 300N}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Sitecom|pid=wl-304v1001|pname=wireless-adsl-2-modem-router-300n}}
This device is... *Likely manufactured by '''Arcadyan''' *Using an '''Infineon''' AMAZON ADSL SoC *Using RT3052 as the WiFi / main SoC
